issue.title: [GitHub] Add ISSUE_TEMPLATE.md
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1697](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1697). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We're starting to get more issues opened on GitHub. It would be good to make these users aware that bugs and feature requests need to end up on JIRA
